**Example 1: 删除任务**



Input: 

```
tccli wedata DeleteOfflineTask --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId 11022568003970304 \
    --VirtualFlag True \
    --OperatorName tom \
    --TaskId 40c442b0-3a33-4a95-ae7f-452eb5fdfa50
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": true,
        "RequestId": "as1cs2c123asyi23bh213cc"
    }
}
```
